main.java.pds

Class Menu

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.pds.Menu

  • public class Menu
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a menu for the PDS. It is immutable.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Menu(java.util.ArrayList<Food> foodItems, java.util.ArrayList<Topping> toppings)
      Create a new Menu with the given foods and toppings.
      Menu(java.io.InputStream input)
      Construct a menu from a file.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Food> getFoodItems()
      Returns a shallow copy of the food items in this menu.
      java.util.ArrayList<Topping> getToppings()
      Returns a shallow copy of the toppings in this menu.
      Food instantiateFood(Food food)
      This method MUST be used when creating an food item from the menu.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Menu

        public Menu(java.io.InputStream input)
     throws java.lang.Exception
        Construct a menu from a file. The syntax of the menu file is as follows: 0 | size | price | price per topping | prep time | cook time | oven space units 1 | name 2 | name | price | prep time | cook time | oven space units # 0 means pizza # 1 means topping # 2 means other # price per topping is for a whole pizza; half pizza is half the topping price
        Parameters:
        input - - an input stream to the file.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

        Create a new Menu with the given foods and toppings.

        toppings -
